categories.name: Voice & Audio
categories.description: Prompts for voice and audio generation

prompts.title: Cinematic Product Reveal
prompts.prompt_text: A sleek smartphone slowly rotating on a pedestal, dramatic studio lighting with purple and blue rim lights, particles floating in the air, camera orbiting 360 degrees, ultra-detailed reflections, commercial photography style, 4K
prompts.tips: Use 'ultra-detailed reflections' to get those premium product shot vibes. The 360-degree orbit keeps it dynamic without being too fast.

prompts.title: Neon Cyberpunk Street
prompts.prompt_text: Rain-soaked Tokyo street at night, neon signs reflecting in puddles, people with umbrellas walking, steam rising from vents, flying cars in background, blade runner aesthetic, moody atmosphere, cinematic composition
prompts.tips: The 'rain-soaked' and 'reflecting in puddles' combo creates instant atmosphere. Add 'blade runner aesthetic' for that iconic cyberpunk look.

prompts.title: Emotional Voice Narration
prompts.prompt_text: A warm, empathetic female voice with slight rasp, speaking slowly and thoughtfully, conveying hope and resilience, documentary narrator style, natural breathing pauses
prompts.tips: Describe the emotional quality first, then the technical aspects. 'Natural breathing pauses' makes it sound more human.

prompts.title: Lo-Fi Hip Hop Beat
prompts.prompt_text: Chill lo-fi hip hop beat, dusty vinyl crackle, mellow piano chords, soft jazz drums, warm bass, rainy day vibes, study music, 90 BPM, nostalgic and relaxing
prompts.tips: Mention specific instruments and the BPM. 'Dusty vinyl crackle' and 'rainy day vibes' nail the lo-fi aesthetic.

prompts.title: Time-Lapse City Sunrise
prompts.prompt_text: Time-lapse of a modern city skyline transitioning from night to sunrise, lights turning off in buildings, sky changing from dark blue to orange and pink, clouds moving fast, golden hour lighting, aerial perspective
prompts.tips: Be specific about the transition (night to sunrise). 'Golden hour lighting' is key for that warm glow.

prompts.title: Fantasy Portrait
prompts.prompt_text: Portrait of an elven warrior, long silver hair flowing, glowing blue eyes, intricate armor with gold details, forest background with magical particles, soft rim lighting, fantasy art style, highly detailed
prompts.tips: Layer details: character features, clothing, background, lighting. 'Magical particles' adds that fantasy touch.

prompts.title: Product Unboxing Animation
prompts.prompt_text: Hands opening a premium tech product box, camera zooming in on the product reveal, soft studio lighting, clean white background, smooth motion, satisfying unboxing experience, ASMR vibes
prompts.tips: 'Satisfying unboxing experience' and 'ASMR vibes' help the AI understand the pacing and feel you want.

prompts.title: Vintage Film Look
prompts.prompt_text: 1970s style photograph, couple walking on beach at sunset, grainy film texture, faded colors, slight vignette, nostalgic mood, Kodak Portra 400 film aesthetic, soft focus
prompts.tips: Reference specific film stocks (Kodak Portra 400) for authentic vintage looks. 'Grainy film texture' is essential.

prompts.title: Epic Trailer Voice
prompts.prompt_text: Deep, powerful male voice with gravitas, movie trailer narrator style, dramatic pauses, building intensity, authoritative and commanding tone, cinematic delivery
prompts.tips: 'Building intensity' and 'dramatic pauses' help create that trailer feel. Be specific about tone and delivery.

prompts.title: Synthwave Sunset Drive
prompts.prompt_text: Retro synthwave track, pulsing bassline, bright synth arpeggios, 80s drum machine, neon sunset vibes, driving rhythm, nostalgic and energetic, 128 BPM
prompts.tips: Genre + specific instruments + mood + BPM = perfect music prompt. 'Neon sunset vibes' captures the aesthetic.

prompts.title: Drone Shot Mountain Peak
prompts.prompt_text: Aerial drone shot rising up a snow-covered mountain peak, revealing vast mountain range in background, golden hour lighting, dramatic clouds, cinematic camera movement, epic landscape
prompts.tips: Describe the camera movement clearly ('rising up'). Golden hour + dramatic clouds = instant epic feel.

prompts.title: Abstract Fluid Art
prompts.prompt_text: Abstract fluid art, swirling colors of purple, teal, and gold, liquid paint mixing, organic shapes, high contrast, glossy finish, macro photography style, mesmerizing patterns
prompts.tips: Specify colors and textures. 'Macro photography style' gives it that close-up, detailed look.

prompts.title: Podcast Intro Music
prompts.prompt_text: Upbeat podcast intro music, acoustic guitar strumming, light percussion, friendly and inviting mood, conversational energy, 15 seconds, fade in and out
prompts.tips: Short intros need clear mood descriptors. 'Conversational energy' helps match the podcast vibe.

prompts.title: Fashion Model Walk
prompts.prompt_text: Fashion model walking down runway, confident stride, designer outfit with flowing fabric, dramatic lighting from sides, camera tracking movement, high fashion photography, elegant and powerful
prompts.tips: Describe the movement ('confident stride') and lighting setup. 'Flowing fabric' adds dynamic motion.

prompts.title: Sci-Fi Spaceship Interior
prompts.prompt_text: Interior of futuristic spaceship cockpit, holographic displays, blue and white lighting, sleek metallic surfaces, control panels with glowing buttons, wide-angle view, sci-fi movie aesthetic, highly detailed
prompts.tips: Layer the tech details (holographic displays, glowing buttons). 'Sci-fi movie aesthetic' sets the quality bar.
